content.raw: We have a hand model that has a `mimic` tag and I just ran into a similar issue as described [here on Gazebo Q/A](http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/8531/problem-implementing-mimic-joints/), namely the hand violently shaking as soon as grasping an object is attempted (using Gazebo2). Are `mimic` joints supposed to be supported in Gazebo now, or are issues with them expected? The conversation in this ticket sounds like the `mimic`implementation was never finished.
content.html: We have a hand model that has a mimic tag and I just ran into a similar issue as described here on Gazebo Q/A, namely the hand violently shaking as soon as grasping an object is attempted (using Gazebo2). Are mimic joints supposed to be supported in Gazebo now, or are issues with them expected? The conversation in this ticket sounds like the mimicimplementation was never finished.
